monster.name: Candle Golem
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
monster.immune: fire, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Candleborn
trait.text: The candles on the golem's head can be snuffed with water ora strong wind. While its candles are unlit, the golem gains disadvantage on attack rolls until it uses its Cone of Fire action or otherwise relights its candles. If the golem would take fire damage, it instead heals an amount equal to the damage taken and relights its candles if they are unlit.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The golem sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for another 15 feet as long as its candles are lit.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Cone of Fire (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The golems candles flare as it unleashes a 30-foot cone of fire from its mouth. Each creature in the area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a success. If the golem's candles are unlit, they become lit.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage and 4 (1d8) fire damage. The target becomes grappled (escape DC 16). Until the grapple ends, the creature takes 9 (2d8) fire damage at the start of each of the golem's turns. The golem can grapple two creatures, one in each hand.
